name: Foxtrot Flight Training, LLC.
about: Foxtrot Flight Training, LLC, founded by Matthew Harrison in June 2021, is a Part 61 flight school located at the Dowagiac Municipal Airport. With over 1,000 hours of flight experience, Harrison brings a passion for aviation inspired by World War II history. The school offers private and commercial pilot certificates, instrument ratings, high performance and complex endorsements, discovery flights, and flight reviews. Our diverse student base ranges from 14 to 62 years old, and we cater to full-time workers and students with flexible training schedules. We pride ourselves on providing personalized, STEM-based training at competitive prices, aiming to address the industry's need for skilled aviators. With a growing fleet and expanding facilities, Foxtrot Flight Training is dedicated to training the next generation of aviators with a focus on safety, skill, and teamwork.
